line_1: Rewarded with a Sainthood, and an S.
line_2: APOLLO, tho' degraded, still can bless,
For you freely must own you were at a Dead lift;

line_1: Who so did fail — and that was S —
line_2: I know the man, and grieve to say't,

line_1: Pleas'd with the task impos'd by S—;
line_2: For thee, on whom the sisters wait
